/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with red brick buildings, their vibrant color contrasting with the clear blue sky above. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. A white van is parked on the right side of the street, perhaps waiting for its driver to return. On the left side of the street, a blue fence stands out against the red brick buildings, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and the street. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the city's unique blend of history and modernity.
